markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scything Blade Snare](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3382)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=646" />
<trait label="Snare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=809" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=715" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 300 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This snare sends a powerful series of scything blades to slice through a creature entering the snare's square, dealing 10d8 slashing damage (DC 32 [basic](/Actions.aspx?ID=2765) Reflex save).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Scything Blade Snare
